info.name: Main API Collecttion
info.description: Complete API collection for AutoBoy - Nigeria's premier gadget trading platform

body.raw:
{
  "title": "iPhone 15 Pro Max",

response.name: WebSocket Connection Guide
response.body: WebSocket connection established. Use wss://autoboy-go.onrender.com/api/v1/ws/connect with Authorization header.
